channel.title: Databricks on Coding notes - cheat sheets and snippets
channel.description: Recent content in Databricks on Coding notes - cheat sheets and snippets

item.title: Deploy JAR to Azure Databricks from Local Machine
item.description: Goal Deploy a fat JAR file to Azure Databricks DBFS from your local machine using Databricks CLI. Configure Databricks CLI Generate a PAT token in Databricks workspace (User Settings), then configure: databricks configure --token When prompted, enter your workspace URL: https://adb-3772194496043630.10.azuredatabricks.net/ Build and Deploy Build the JAR: cd [ProjectRoot] sbt assembly Push to DBFS (remove existing file first if needed): dbfs rm dbfs:/lib/jars/Arch.Pocs.Databricks.Application.jar dbfs cp ./target/scala-2.12/Arch.Pocs.Databricks.Application.jar dbfs:/lib/jars/Arch.Pocs.Databricks.Application.jar
